DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of the present study are to determine if starting treatement of hyperuricemia with allopurinol during an acute gout crises has an impact on the duration or the severity of the crises
DOC.criteria: More than 18 years old Able to sign informed consent Indication of longterm treatment with allopurinol Acute gout crisis Les than 18 yearsold Unable to consent Contraindication to allopurinol
